scripts.predev-css: rm -f slides.md; rm -f media; ln -s ../css/css.md slides.md; ln -s ../css/media/ media
scripts.predev-html: rm -f slides.md; rm -f media; ln -s ../html/html.md slides.md; ln -s ../html/media/ media
scripts.build-css: npm run predev-css; rm -rf dist; npx slidev build --base /TPSI/css/; rm -rf ../../docs/css/; mv dist/ ../../docs/css/
scripts.build-html: npm run predev-html; rm -rf dist; npx slidev build --base /TPSI/html/; rm -rf ../../docs/html/; mv dist/ ../../docs/html/
scripts.build-local-css: npm run predev-css; rm -rf dist; npx slidev build
scripts.build-local-html: npm run predev-html; rm -rf dist; npx slidev build
